item.title: Looking to bring my videos and pictures to life! In memory of my son - Upwork
item.description:
My son was murdered at the age of 17...Since his passing I started a non profit organization helping others in his honor and keeping him alive in spirit.....His Angelversary is coming up July 31st and I want a FACINATING heart wrenching video to show his legacy that I have been plugging away at since his death and also honor my boy!

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 25, 2024 01:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Photo Slideshow, Testimonial Video, Concept Video, Corporate Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: Photo Slideshow, Testimonial Video, Concept Video, Corporate Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
